overview: Seeking answers and vengeance, Ryo Hazuki arrives in the bustling metropolis of Hong Kong. Encountering new friends and foes alike, Ryo pursues his goal of avenging his father's death and unlocking the mysteries of the Phoenix Mirror. Join The Gang as they continue to spoof one of the finest video games in history! This is Shenmue II: The Gang Edition!
title: Shenmue II - The Gang Edition
